items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning
items.body: This dress was absolutely stunning just like the picture. Im 5'4" 127lbs, with 3" heels on, I still needed an inch off. Sadly, it was so expensive to get it altered bc of the sequins. It is the only reason I'm returning it. Read more
items.author: Pamela Adams

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Dress
items.body: Beautiful dress . I wish it fit my daughter but it was too large for her petite frame Read more
items.author: Stan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good color and quality
items.body: Dress is good quality. Not a lot of support in the dress. Lining is white and sequin is silver. Dress stil looks very silver. Size was to be expected. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit Perfect!
items.body: I love it! I'm a size 2/4 and bought a small. It fits perfectly with some room. There is some stretch but I didn't need it! Read more
items.author: FairMom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would Absolutely Reccomend!
items.body: This dress looks exactly like it does in the picture! I had to adjust some things like the hem and had to sinch the waist to fit slightly better, but the quality is great and the fabric shimmers very well in both dark and light. I would order this dress again 100% and recommend it to anyone who is looking for a formal dress that stands out! Read more
items.author: Shivali Chainani

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars One shoulder dress
items.body: Unfortunately for me the dress fabric was too revealing, and I could see the shape of my legs and back. It might be good to another person, but it's not for me. But, only the one shoulder dress was like that. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs a bit long
items.body: This dress is very pretty and the sequins are in a very appealing pattern. This dress was too long for me and the price to hem it was too expensive so overall this dress didn’t workout. It would be helpful if it came in “short” sizes also. Wish it had a clip to reinforce the top of zipper. Read more
items.author: Bess

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Evening Maxi Formal Bodycon One Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Evening Maxi Formal Bodycon One Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gold, Silver, Rose Gold, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
